results.name: 查詢 W01 庫房料號存量
results.query: 查詢W01庫房 每個料號的存量
results.sql: SELECT img01, SUM(img10) FROM img_file WHERE img02 = 'W01' GROUP BY img01

results.name: 查詢料號 10-0001 庫存
results.query: 查詢料號 10-0001 的庫存信息

results.name: 按倉庫統計總庫存
results.sql: SELECT img02, SUM(img10) FROM img_file GROUP BY img02

results.name: 查詢前 10 個庫存最多物料
results.query: 列出前 10 個庫存量最多的物料
results.sql: SELECT img01, SUM(img10) FROM img_file GROUP BY img01 ORDER BY SUM(img10) DESC LIMIT 10

results.name: 查詢 W03 成品倉庫存
results.query: 查詢 W03 成品倉的庫存
